kernels = [gpflow.kernels.Matern12(), gpflow.kernels.Linear(), gpflow.
    kernels.Matern32()]
with pytest.raises(ValueError, match=error_msg):
    gpflow.kernels.ChangePoints(kernels, locations, steepness)
pytest.mark.parametrize('locations, steepness, error_msg', [[[1.0], 1.0,
    'Number of kernels \\(3\\) must be one more than the number of changepoint locations \\(1\\)'
    ], [[1.0, 2.0], [1.0],
    'Dimension of steepness \\(1\\) does not match number of changepoint locations \\(2\\)'
    ]])
